messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spanking
messages.msgSnippet: ... My mother is of the firm opinion that the reason for so many teenage pregnannices, crime rates etc etc, is to much permissive parenting and not enough
messages.messageBody:
On 26 Oct 02, at 8:05, Lee Roversi wrote:

> ****undeniable, illegal, abuses
>
> But, in some countries in the world, spanking is just that - - -
> undeniably abusive and therefore illegal.
>
> Love, Lee
>
My mother is of the firm opinion that the reason for so many
teenage pregnannices, crime rates etc etc, is to much permissive
parenting and not enough spanking.
She's always yelling at my kids for not 'showing respect'

Sigh

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.msgSnippet: ****undeniable, illegal, abuses But, in some countries in the world, spanking is just that - - - undeniably abusive and therefore illegal. Love, Lee North

abusive and therefore illegal.

Love, Lee
